summary:
• Over 7 years of experience in Oracle Products (Oracle SOA Suite, Oracle Service Bus, OIC, Oracle DB, Oracle Apps)
• Good knowledge in Service-Oriented Architecture and its related technologies like BPEL, Mediator, WSDL, WADL, SOAP, REST, XML, XSD, XSLT, and Web Service Security.
• Hands-on experience with Oracle Fusion Middleware, SOA 12c, OSB 12c.
• Strong knowledge & experience with web services
• Experience in developing and deploying OSB using DB Adapter, SOAP Adaptor, REST Adaptor, JMS Adaptor, File Adapter.
• Experience in Audit logging and Fault handling features of SOA Suite 12g like Fault Management Framework, catch/catch-all branches.
• Understanding of database MDS repository to store all the common artifacts between composites like DVM, XSD.
• Knowledge of in-build schemas SOA suite.
• Developed various Web Services using WSDL and SOAP
• Testing by using SOAP UI, Postman tool

awards.title: Dr. A.P.J Abdul Kalam Award Gold Medal
awards.description: Got 7th position in University merit list.

awards.title: Meritorious Award
awards.description: Got position in University merit list as well as won silver medal in university games. Well done in studies and sports helped me to won this award.

awards.title: Best Junior Speaker
awards.description: A debate was conducted on District level. Vijay Sampla, Minister of State for Social Justice and Empowerment in India, is a member of parliament from Hoshiarpur who presented this award.

awards.title: National Bravery Award
awards.description: Saved 4 students from river who were getting drowned. Kewal Krishan (10 October 1923 – 30 June 2008) was a medical practitioner and politician in Punjab, India. He was the Speaker of the Punjab Legislative Assembly (Vidhan Sabha) from 2002 to 2007.He awarded me for this activity.

projects.title: M.H. Alshaya Co.
projects.description:
While working with the Major Retail Client Alshaya based out of the Middle East, I have worked on Various brands going live on their Oracle SOA Cloud and many integrations related to it. 
Built new Integrations across many brands e.g. West Elm, Boots, H&M, Bath and Body Works, Americal Eagle, Pottery Barns, etc. 
Provided support on the production Environment after getting Brands Live in Production to the client as well.

projects.title: DBA Patch Tool
projects.description: IT is a tool for making a record of Patch applied and requested patches in Databases. I made it by using Oracle Application Express and Oracle 12 c database.

projects.title: Passport IDs
projects.description: It was a tool used while making a passport. which can store record of any user in digital format.

projects.title: Hangout with Robo
projects.description: I made a robot in C++ which can help to give direction to any deaf person. It will just speak where he/she has to go after putting the address into it.

projects.title: Bank Management System
projects.description: The common unique feature in Bank Management System is providing support to manage personal finance. This process involves importing of transactional data in to accounting software. The accounting software is considered as banking platform that supports aggregation of a person’s account.

projects.title: Airline Reservation System
projects.description:
This is the airline system which is used to store records various information about the customer and flight details. It performs the following operations:-
 Reservation : It stores the data of the customers which reserve their tickets for a particular journey.
 Cancellation :It cancels the already stored records of the customer in case they want to cancel the tickets they reserved. 
There are other operations which are used to see various lists of records of customer ,flights and passenger onboard.

projects.title: EPIC
projects.description: As part of this project, I was closely working with Client IOCL for their various integrations requirements and fulfilling their needs for the LPG-Ujjwala and Fuel Pricing Updation. After Discussing the requirement in the client meetings to Developing, Unit Testing and delivering the effective code on stipulated time was my key area on this project.

projects.title: Customer Management Data Managerment (CMDM)
projects.description:
Description:
As part of this project, various Application are integrated(CDM, CDMP, ERP, ES, PMDM, EDW,
Salesforce, SNOW, PB, QB, Zuora, MyNCR, DRM), some external vendors are also integrated with
this e.g. DnB, Loquate. As part of this project, developing middleware services based on
Integration architecture using OSB 12c,BPEL, Mediators for development. Integrating various
Front-End Consumers with different Backends.

 Roles and Responsibilities:
•	Development of BPEL Process to communicate with OSB.
•	Creation of OSB services.
•	Working with Oracle adapters (DB, JMS, File, SOAP, REST)
•	Configuration of Fault Handling 
•	Testing by using SOAP UI, Postman
•	Bug fixing and code reviews

projects.title: GST India E-Invoicing Project
projects.description:
Description:
As part of this project, GST India E-Invoicing Project, NCR needed to implement
integrated with E&Y DigiGST to get the Invoice Number Registration and QR Code. As part of
this project, developing middleware services based on Integration architecture using OSB
12c,BPEL for development. Integrating various Front-End Consumers with different Backends.
Roles and Responsibilities:
•	Involved in the development of different Integration APIs(Both SOAP and REST).
•	Working with Oracle adapters (DB,SOAP, REST)
•	Configuration of Fault Handling
•	Ensured E2E delivery from Requirement understanding to Development to Production Deployment
•	Testing by using SOAP UI, Postman

projects.title: ERP Mfg Operational Data Store
projects.description: Working As Oracle Apps DBA.. and Doing regular work on this project as DBA. Creating DB, Upgrading , applying patches, cloning, Support etc.

projects.title: As A Service Project
projects.description:
As part of this project, NCR Started provided subscriptions for some services as well. As part
of this project, developing middleware services based on Integration architecture using OSB ,
12c,BPEL for development. Integrating various Front-End Consumers with different Backends.

Roles and Responsibilities:

•	Development of various BPEL processes to facilitate the integration
•	Developed OSB Services and adapters to fetch data
•	Develop SOA Composite using various adapters (DB, JMS, SOAP, REST)
•	Adapters’ configuration 
•	Creating test suit by using SOAP UI

projects.title: Manufacturing Hold Automation
projects.description:
Through this project , the lock is getting automatically removed by sending Unit Information
from ERP to RQS to process further for testing in manufacturing plants.

Roles and Responsibilities:
•	Database configurations for proper logging of errors.
•	Creating web services which work according to the flow
•	Adapters’ configuration 
•	Creating test suit by using SOAP UI
•	Bug fixing and code reviews

projects.title: Deming
projects.description:
In this project, We integrate the applications (Salesforce, QB, PB, Zuora, ERP, PMDM) , to send
the customer acceptance delivery information of any order which is being placed to customer.

Roles and Responsibilities:
•	Creating and configuring services using Oracle Service Bus.
•	Creating and executing BPEL Process flows.
•	Usage of file service for read/write from/to external files.
•	Creating SOAPUI test cases for testing the flow
•	Bug fixing and code reviews
•	Create documentation for the processes.

projects.title: KBR_Support
projects.description: In this project we are maintaining our application as well as database so that our system can be available and reliable. For completing this we do patching (Apps and DB), Cloning to create new test and dev envs. Checking Concurrent managers and other maintenance. Working on workflow, bouncing workflow mailer and other services, Bouncing databases, upgrading to its newer versions, providing support 24*7 in flexible shifts. Creating SR for new support from oracle. Providing SOX Evidences to PWC is also veru cruial part of this project.Provide 24*7 Availability of ERP/ES Applications throughout the year. Make Systems and Databases Available, Reliable and Consistent to work on.

projects.title: Holiday Sight Seeing
projects.description:
I think it’s really important that the community has a clear vision about what they want to offer tourist. A luxurious vacation or a rural traditional experience. Different resources are needed for different visions. 
The project aims at increasing and promoting slow tourist itineraries in Italian and Slovenian area, particularly involving the territories with naturalistic and environmental peculiarities as park areas, protected areas, the presence of river courses, through the structuring of slow tourist circuits and itineraries.

projects.title: Online Examination System
projects.description: The online examination system consists a web server with database facility. The server of this system is mostly configured with proper security  measures.  Students can connect yourself through the internet to the server and take the exam. The one most important thing about this system is that examiners can also connect to the server with the help of the internet for setting up papers and to do other related tasks.

projects.title: Tank Game
projects.description: It is a game. By using simple programming skills i made this. I submitted it for Harvard Extension School. URL: http://scratch.mit.edu/projects/21929279/

• Working On Oracle SOA Suite (BPEL, Mediator, OSB), OIC, Oracle API Gateway, ODI, MFT with Retail Client in the Middle East (Alshaya)

• Agile methodology using Scrum, and involves integration of services using Oracle Fusion Middleware stack. Responsible for requierment analysis, designing processes and working with various ERP modules - OM, OTM, Gov, Payroll etc.

profile_positions.description:
• Worked closely with the Client IOCL and build the Integration for the LPG Ujjawala and Aviation Fuel.
• Worked on the Integration of SAP, Siebel, DB (Oracle & IBM DB2) Adapter, JMS, SOAP, REST Adapters.

profile_positions.title: Advisory System Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Good knowledge in Service-Oriented Architecture and its related technologies like BPEL, Mediator, WSDL, WADL, SOAP, REST, XML, XSD, XSLT, and Web Service Security.
• Hands-on experience with Oracle Fusion Middleware, SOA 12c, 11g, OSB 12c, 11g.
• Strong knowledge & experience with web services

• Experience in Audit logging and Fault handling features of SOA Suite 12g like Fault Management Framework, catch/catch-all branches.
• Understanding of database MDS repository to store all the common artifacts between composites like DVM, XSD.
• Knowledge of in-build schemas SOA suite.

Responsible for requirement analysis, designing processes, and working with various ERP modules - OM, OTM, Governance, Procurement, Payroll, Asset Management, Manufacturing, CRM, Financials, SCM, Quotes, Mobile.
profile_positions.title: Application Development Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	2 years of professional IT experience in Oracle R12 Application (12.1) and Oracle DB 12c.
•	Monitoring and troubleshooting Apache, Forms, Concurrent Manager, Database related issues, Cloning.
•	Good exposure of working on production DB 12c and handling performance issues in application.
•	Administration & maintenance including patching and cloning.
•	24*7 support from client Location. Working in all the shifts.
•	Experience in Application and database patching, cloning and upgrades
•	Using shell scripting to create, edit new scripts. 
•	Daily morning and evening checklists to keep track of all the activities.
•	Users Administration (Roles and Profiles), Password change implementation.
•	Bounce SOA-Soup Containers and Make connection with Oracle DBs.
•	Patching the Database and application using adpatch and opatch as per the solution from SR.
•	Monitoring of Concurrent manager, Requests.
•	Database back-up Jobs using RMAN and performing hot and cold back-up jobs.
•	Ticket Monitoring Tools, Atlas Task, Remedy Tool, Service Now to resolve within SLA.
profile_positions.title: Application Development Analyst

volunteer_experiences.description: We organize events for poor children for education and Sports activities in various locations in the Chandigarh/Mohali Area.

Organising Events for the Education of the Poor Children and families. 1 in 11 children go to work when they should be in school. When it is hard to afford necessities like food, shelter, and clothing; education becomes a luxury that the poor give up. Illiteracy then leads to further poverty. Donate for child education in India, support them with fees, school supplies, footwear, transport and opportunities to showcase their talents.

The programme aims to provide socio-economic empowerment to rural women through SHGs, their promotion and livelihood enhancement/micro entrepreneurship initiatives. It builds their confidence and self belief while demonstrating the power of collectivisation. Apart from skilling and pooling of resources, they are guided on revenue generation and given linkages to avenues for marketing.
